brands.name: Samsung

services.title: Samsung Refrigerator Repair
services.description: Fix ice maker issues, cooling problems, digital display errors, and Smart Hub connectivity issues in all Samsung fridge models.

services.title: Samsung Washer Repair
services.description: Resolve error codes, drainage problems, spinning issues, and Smart Control problems in Samsung washing machines.

services.title: Samsung Dryer Repair
services.description: Fix heating issues, moisture sensor problems, and lint buildup in all Samsung dryer models including FlexDry.

services.title: Samsung Dishwasher Repair
services.description: Repair cleaning issues, water leaks, and control panel problems in Samsung dishwashers with WaterWall technology.

services.title: Samsung Range Repair
services.description: Service gas and electric ranges, including Smart Dial controls, convection issues, and self-cleaning problems.

services.title: Samsung Microwave Repair
services.description: Fix heating problems, turntable issues, and sensor cooking malfunctions in over-the-range and countertop models.

common_problems: Ice maker not working or making hollow ice cubes
Refrigerator not cooling but freezer works fine
Washer showing UE, DC, or ND error codes
Dryer not heating or taking too long to dry
Dishwasher leaving spots or not cleaning properly

services.title: LG Refrigerator Repair
services.description: Expert repair for Linear Compressor issues, ice maker problems, and InstaView door malfunctions.

services.title: LG Washer Repair
services.description: Fix OE, UE, and LE error codes, TurboWash problems, and Wi-Fi connectivity issues.

services.title: LG Dryer Repair
services.description: Resolve heating problems, sensor dry issues, and TurboSteam malfunctions.
